title: From Max Weber Edited by H. H. Gerth and C. Wright Mills (Pp. xi + 490; 30s.) - Man and Culture Edited by Raymond Firth. (Pp. viii + 292; 21s.) - Primitive Classification By E. Durkheim and M.
